mathara, palatuwa gunarathna widyalaye paha wasara igenuma labana ke. em. lochana dewmini (awu 91/2) shishyawa darunu hadawath rogayakin pelena bawin aya suwapath kirimata nam haki ikmanin hadawath sathkamak kala yuthu bawata galla, karapitiya shikshana rohale hruda roga wisheshagnya waidya namal gamage mahatha nirdesha kara atha.mema shalya karmaya sandaha lochana dariya indiyawata ragena yayuthu heyin ee sandaha wishala mudalak awashya bawath palatuwa aththudawa, madagedara, ‚Äúhiruni‚Äù, niwase padinchi ayage demawupiyanta ema mudala soya ganima ithamath asiru katayuththak wi athi nisath owun thama diyaniyage jiwithaya bera ganimata parithyagashilin ge sahaya pathayi.mathara, sampath bankuwe anka 101050361390 darana ginuma aya wenuwen wiwruthawa pawathina athara wadi wisthara dana ganimata 0779706816 durakathana ankayata amathumak labadena lesa lochanage demawupiyo illimak kara atha..
